price: সেইদিনা মানুহক অৱহিত কৰোৱা হ’ব, সি আগলৈ কি পঠিয়াইছিল আৰু পিছফালে কি থৈ আহিছে।
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
